mapper.select: select u.name AS name, u.famNum AS famNum, u.address AS address, u.year AS year, u.month AS month, u.day AS day, u.isMoon AS isMoon, u.phone AS phone from USER u order by month, year, day;

select u.name AS name, u.famNum AS famNum, u.address AS address, u.year AS year, u.month AS month, u.day AS day, u.isMoon AS isMoon, u.phone AS phone from USER u where u.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') order by month, year, day;
